text: A Heart of Gold is a 1915 American silent romantic drama short film directed by Tom Ricketts starring Harry von Meter, Reaves Eason, Louise Lester, Jack Richardson, and Vivian Rich. ==Cast== * Harry von Meter as Jim * Jack Richardson as Jake Price * Reaves Eason as Fred * Vivian Rich as Mary Price, Jake's Wife * Louise Lester as Mrs. Carr ==External links== * * Category:1915 films Category:1915 romantic drama films Category:American romantic drama films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 short films Category:1915 drama films
title: A Heart of Gold
